TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DataOperationsCatalog extends System.Object

Docs.summary: A catalog of operations over data that are not transformers or estimators. This includes data readers, saving, caching, filtering etc.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Data.DataView.IDataView Cache (Microsoft.Data.DataView.IDataView input, params string[] columnsToPrefetch);
.method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Data.DataView.IDataView Cache(class Microsoft.Data.DataView.IDataView input, string[] columnsToPrefetch) cil managed
Public Function Cache (input As IDataView, ParamArray columnsToPrefetch As String()) As IDataView

Docs.param: The columns that must be cached whenever anything is cached. Empty array or null is acceptable, it means that all columns are only cached at the first access.
Docs.summary: Creates a lazy in-memory cache of . Caching happens per-column. A column is only cached when it is first accessed. In addition, are considered 'always needed', so all of them will be cached whenever any data is requested.

.method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Data.DataView.IDataView FilterByColumn(class Microsoft.Data.DataView.IDataView input, string columnName, float64 lowerBound, float64 upperBound) cil managed
Public Function FilterByColumn (input As IDataView, columnName As String, Optional lowerBound As Double = -∞, Optional upperBound As Double = ∞) As IDataView
member this.FilterByColumn : Microsoft.Data.DataView.IDataView * string * double * double -> Microsoft.Data.DataView.IDataView

Docs.param: The name of a column to use for filtering.
Docs.summary: Keep only those rows that satisfy the range condition: the value of column must be between and , inclusive.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Data.DataView.IDataView FilterByKeyColumnFraction (Microsoft.Data.DataView.IDataView input, string columnName, double lowerBound = 0, double upperBound = 1);

.method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Data.DataView.IDataView FilterByKeyColumnFraction(class Microsoft.Data.DataView.IDataView input, string columnName, float64 lowerBound, float64 upperBound) cil managed
Public Function FilterByKeyColumnFraction (input As IDataView, columnName As String, Optional lowerBound As Double = 0, Optional upperBound As Double = 1) As IDataView
member this.FilterByKeyColumnFraction : Microsoft.Data.DataView.IDataView * string * double * double -> Microsoft.Data.DataView.IDataView

Docs.param: The name of a column to use for filtering.
Docs.summary: Keep only those rows that satisfy the range condition: the value of a key column (treated as a fraction of the entire key range) must be between and , inclusive. This filtering is useful if the is a key column obtained by some 'stable randomization' (for example, hashing).
